cardContent.title: My Career Journey
cardContent.description: After finishing my undergrad in 2014, I became a content editor at an e-learning startup and have been working in digital content ever since. In 2018, I became a contractor at Meta and supported the research marketing team until 2019 when I received headcount. I was laid off at the end of 2022 while enrolled in grad school. Since then, I've been working various part-time and freelance jobs.

cardContent.title: Breaking into Tech
cardContent.description: In 2021, I decided to try something new and earn a Master's in Computer Science from Northeastern University's Align Program, which is designed for students who did not major in CS in their undergrad. I graduated in May 2024 with a primary focus on building digital experiences (web dev, HCI, info retrieval) and a secondary focus in AI, machine learning, and NLP.

cardContent.title: Learn More
cardContent.description: If you want to learn more about me, I've prompt-engineered a GPT-4 chatbot to answer questions on my behalf using info from this website and my LinkedIn.

cardContent.title: Get in Touch
cardContent.description: If you'd like to get in touch for whatever reason, you can send me a message on LinkedIn â€” or you can shoot me an email (click to copy).
